tit.j: 福知山市内自主運行バス
tit.e: Fukuchiyama City Local Voluntary Operation Bus
Fukuchiyama City Local Voluntary Operation Bus
Fukuchiyama City Local Voluntary Operation Bus

sen.j: 福知山市内自主運行バス（ふくちやましないじしゅうんこうバス）は、京都府福知山市で運行されている廃止代替バス（80条バス）。
sen.e: The Fukuchiyama City Local Voluntary Operation Bus is the bus route operated by Fukuchiyama City, (Kyoto Prefecture) by replacing the discontinued regular bus route. (No. 80 Route)
The Fukuchiyama City Local Voluntary Operation Bus is the bus route operated by Fukuchiyama City, (Kyoto Prefecture) by replacing the discontinued regular bus route (No. 80 Route).
sen.cmt: ピリオド位置を訂正しました。
sen.e: The Fukuchiyama City Local Voluntary Operation Bus service is operated by Fukuchiyama City (Kyoto Prefecture) as a replacement for the discontinued regular bus route (No. 80 Route).
sen.cmt: A bus cannot be a bus route…

sen.j: 中六人部（なかむとべ）バス・庵我（あんが）バス・三岳（みたけ）バスの3路線がある。
sen.e: There are three routes for this bus service; Nakamutobe Bus, Anga Bus and Mitake Bus.
There are three routes for this bus service; Nakamutobe Bus, Anga Bus and Mitake Bus.
There are three routes for this bus service; Nakamutobe Bus, Anga Bus and Mitake Bus.

sen.j: 運行開始は3路線とも1994年10月1日。
sen.e: All three routes began their operations on October 1, 1994.
All three routes began their operations on October 1, 1994.
All three routes began their operations on October 1, 1994.

sen.j: 運行は平日・土曜のみで日曜は全便運休。
sen.e: The operation of the bus is on weekdays and Saturday, while there is no operation on Sunday.
The operation of the bus is on weekdays and Saturday, while there is no operation on Sunday.
The operation of the bus is on weekdays and Saturday, while there is no operation on Sunday.
There is no bus operation for new year holiday season, from December 30 to January 3.
There is no bus operation for new year holiday season, from December 30 to January 3.
There is no bus operation for new year holiday season, from December 30 to January 3.
The fare of this bus service is based on the travel distance, added to the base fare.
The fare of this bus service is based on the travel distance, added to the base fare.
The fare of this bus service is based on the travel distance, added to the base fare.

sen.j: 京都交通 (舞鶴)・西日本ジェイアールバスなどと競合する近郊・都心の一部バス停では、福知山行きを降車のみ、福知山発を乗車のみとして棲み分けを図っている。
sen.e: The operation area of this route near the center of the city overlaps with other competitors' such as the Kyoto Transport (Maizuru Management Office) and the West JR Bus, therefore getting on and off of this bus at the bus stops in such area is pre-defined and limited in order to clearly separate and make it easier for the passengers to understand the covering area of each bus route. (Ex. Some bus stops at the center of the city area for those buses heading for Fukuchiyama are fixed for getting off only, while those for the buses departing from Fukuchiyama are set for boarding only)
sen.cmt: 原文の意味把握ができないものになっています。直訳すると意味が通じる文章になりません。想定される意味合いとなるように訳してみましたが確認が必要です。
sen.e: The operation area of this route near the center of the city overlaps with other competitors' such as the Kyoto Transport (Maizuru Management Office) and the West JR Bus, therefore getting on and off of this bus at the bus stops in such area is pre-defined and limited in order to clearly separate and make it easier for the passengers to understand the covering area of each bus route. (Ex. Some bus stops at the center of the city area for those buses heading for Fukuchiyama are fixed for getting off only, while those for the buses departing from Fukuchiyama are set for boarding only)

At bus stops in the suburbs or the center of the city where the Fukuchiyama City Local Voluntary Operation Bus is in competition with Kyoto Transport (Maizuru Management Office) and West JR Bus, you can only get off buses heading for Fukuchiyama and you can only get on buses departing from Fukuchiyama.
sen.cmt: 原文に合わせて全体を修正

sen.j: 中六人部バス運行協議会が運営。
sen.e: The Nakamutobe Bus Board of Operation is managing the operation of the buses of this route.
The Nakamutobe Bus Board of Operation is managing the operation of the buses of this route.
The Nakamutobe Bus Board of Operation is managing the operation of the buses of this route.

sen.j: 市民病院前 - 福知山駅 - 市役所前 - 新開 - 田野山田公民館前
sen.e: Civic Hospital Front - Fukuchiyama Station - City Hall Front - Shinkai - Tano Yamada Community Center Front
Civic Hospital Front - Fukuchiyama Station - City Hall Front - Shinkai - Tano Yamada Community Center Front
Civic Hospital Front - Fukuchiyama Station - City Hall Front - Shinkai - Tano Yamada Community Center Front

sen.j: 庵我バス運行協議会が運営。
sen.e: The Anga Bus Board of Operation is managing the operation of the buses of this route.
The Anga Bus Board of Operation is managing the operation of the buses of this route.
The Anga Bus Board of Operation is managing the operation of the buses of this route.

sen.j: 市民病院前 - 福知山駅 - 筈巻
sen.e: Civic Hospital Front - Fukuchiyama Station - Hazumaki
Civic Hospital Front - Fukuchiyama Station - Hazumaki
Civic Hospital Front - Fukuchiyama Station - Hazumaki

sen.j: 三岳バス運行協議会が運営。
sen.e: The Mitake Bus Board of Operation is managing the operation of the buses of this route,
The Mitake Bus Board of Operation is managing the operation of the buses of this route,
The Mitake Bus Board of Operation is managing the operation of the buses of this route,

sen.j: 市役所前 - 福知山駅 - 上佐々木
sen.e: City Hall Front - Fukuchiyama Station - Kamisasaki
City Hall Front - Fukuchiyama Station - Kamisasaki
City Hall Front - Fukuchiyama Station - Kamisasaki

sen.j: かつては全但バスが府県境を越え、上佐々木で連絡していたが、2008年9月30日に運行休止となった。
sen.e: Although the Zentan Bus Co. Ltd. used to operate a bus route coming from Hyogo Prefecture by going across the prefectural boarder and connecting to the Fukuchiyama City Local Voluntary Operation Bus route at Kamisasaki bus stop, the bus route was discontinued on September 30, 2008.

Although the Zentan Bus Co. Ltd. used to operate a bus route coming from Hyogo Prefecture by going across the prefectural boarder and connecting to the Fukuchiyama City Local Voluntary Operation Bus route at Kamisasaki bus stop, the bus route was discontinued on September 30, 2008.

Although the Zentan Bus Co. Ltd. used to operate a bus route coming from Hyogo Prefecture by going across the prefectural boarder and connecting to the Fukuchiyama City Local Voluntary Operation Bus route at Kamisasaki bus stop, the bus route was discontinued on September 30, 2008.
